page.title: 09Transport
page.content: {Transport}in our area We live the{motorway}which was built to take traffic away from busy {Morriston Cross}and to help Wales develop her Industries. In 1985 we have many means of transport.We have cars,motorbikes,lorries,aeroplanes,shi ps and many other things. I have only been in a bus,train, car,aeroplane,ship and on a fast motorbike.I used to hate{motorbikes but now I love them.My dad doesn't have one but my next door neighbour does.I've been on it quite a few times.It roars like a dragon and the wind blows your hair out like a flag. Lots of people don't have their own transport and use buses.Buses may change in the future and there may be new kinds of transport invented.
